languages.text: "Ты странно изъясняешься. Это из-за аугментации, или, может, так велит твоя вера?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты странно изъясняешься. Это из-за аугментации, или, может, так велит твоя вера?"

languages.text: "You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"
languages.original_text: "Ты странно изъясняешься. Это из-за аугментации, или, может, так велит твоя вера?"

traits.locale_text: "You have a strange way of speaking. Is this because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should explain yourself?"
"You have a strange way of speaking. Is this because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should explain yourself?"
"You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"
"You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"
"You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"

languages.text: “你说话的方式很古怪。这是因为植入物的原因吗？还是说，你的信仰规定你就应该这么说话？”
languages.original_text: "You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"

traits.locale_text: “你说话的方式很古怪。这是因为植入物的原因吗？还是说，你的信仰规定你就应该这么说话？”

languages.text: «Su forma de hablar me resulta extraña. ¿Se debe a los aumentos o es su fe la que le dicta la forma de expresarse?».
languages.original_text: "You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"

traits.locale_text: «Su forma de hablar me resulta extraña. ¿Se debe a los aumentos o es su fe la que le dicta la forma de expresarse?».

languages.text: 「奇妙な話し方だな。オーグメティックのせいか？それとも信仰が表現方法を決めているのか？」
languages.original_text: "You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"

traits.locale_text: 「奇妙な話し方だな。オーグメティックのせいか？それとも信仰が表現方法を決めているのか？」

languages.text: "Ihr klingt sehr merkwürdig. Liegt das an Eurer Augmentation oder schreibt Euer Glaube Euch vor, wie Ihr Euch ausdrücken sollt?"
languages.original_text: "You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr klingt sehr merkwürdig. Liegt das an Eurer Augmentation oder schreibt Euer Glaube Euch vor, wie Ihr Euch ausdrücken sollt?"

languages.text: « Vous vous exprimez de façon étrange. Cela vient-il de vos augmentations, ou vos paroles sont-elles dictées par votre foi ? »
languages.original_text: "You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous exprimez de façon étrange. Cela vient-il de vos augmentations, ou vos paroles sont-elles dictées par votre foi ? »

languages.text: "İlginç bir konuşma biçimin var. Ogmentler yüzünden mi kendini nasıl ifade edeceğini inancın mı dikte ediyor?"
languages.original_text: "You have a strange way of speaking. Is that because of the augmentation or does your faith dictate how you should express yourself?"

traits.locale_text: "İlginç bir konuşma biçimin var. Ogmentler yüzünden mi yoksa inancın kendini nasıl ifade edeceğini dikte mi ediyor?"
